Articles.Content:
SS Titan

The SS Titan is a SSTO Drop ship capable of holding 6 drop pods and two other small crafts. The ship is powered by solar panels on the left and right sides of the ship so be sure to face them towards the Sun to avoid power problems.

The ship uses the new B9 HX-HPD engines and in order to get the ship into orbit the engines will need to be turned onto Hybrid Plasma mode once the ship is out of Kerbins Atmosphere. (I haven't made action group to switch mode)

The SS Titan is made of 471 parts so may cause performance issues such as lower fps but you can redesign to reduce the part count.

(TO LAUNCH THE SS TITAN GO INTO THE SPH AND FACE THE CRAFT UPWARDS)

Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8wad8wt0vvzhugk/SS%20Titan.craft?dl=0

Mods used:

B9, LLL and KAS
Goes to show that even with HX parts, you can still go nuts on the part count and overload laptops world wide. It's an accomplishment, really.

Gee 471 is a high part count these days?

no wonder my craft scare a lot of people away lol

anywho ill have to fire it up and check it out, have not really built much with the new b9 parts myself
what part is the "windtriple" part? its the only part that's giving me issues and because of it i cant use your ship so...y'know if you can pls halp
